headline: Hollywood Has a Thriller On Its Hands
abstract: When it comes to Oscar’s top prize, this is the most wide-open competition in years. Which film has the right factors to go all the way?
lead_paragraph: The race for this year’s acting Oscars couldn’t possibly be less suspenseful: You can engrave those Academy Awards right now for Joaquin Phoenix (“Joker”), Renée Zellweger (“Judy”), Brad Pitt (“Once Upon a Time … in Hollywood”) and Laura Dern (“Marriage Story”), the fearsome foursome set to sweep up every trophy from now until Feb. 9, when the ceremony will take place.
keywords: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood (Movie)
